events.title: Adoption Drive: Find Your Furry Friend
events.description: Join us for a day full of fun, games, and adoption opportunities! Meet pets looking for their forever homes.

events.title: Fundraising Gala for Shelter Expansion
events.description: Support our mission to expand and improve shelter facilities. Enjoy a night of dinner, live music, and charity auctions.

events.title: Pet Health & Wellness Workshop
events.description: Learn about pet nutrition, training, and healthcare from professionals. Free vet check-ups for attending pets!

events.title: Volunteer Orientation Day
events.description: Interested in volunteering? Attend this orientation to learn how you can help animals and our shelter programs.

events.title: Paws & Play Family Picnic
events.description: Bring your family and furry friends for a picnic in the park with games, food stalls, and pet-friendly activities.

events.title: Pet Adoption Fair at the Mall
events.description: Meet adoptable pets at our pop-up event inside the mall. A fun and convenient way to find your furry friend!

events.title: Halloween Pet Costume Contest
events.description: Dress up your pets for Halloween! Prizes for funniest, scariest, and cutest costumes. Open to all ages.

events.title: Charity Fun Run: Run for Paws
events.description: Participate in our 5K charity run to support shelter animals. All proceeds go towards food, medical care, and housing.

events.title: Holiday Toy & Blanket Drive
events.description: Donate toys, food, and blankets to keep our animals warm and happy during the winter season.

events.title: Pet Photography Day
events.description: Get professional photos taken of your pets! Proceeds support shelter animals while you capture memories.

events.title: Winter Adoption Festival
events.description: A festive adoption event with hot cocoa, music, and lots of adorable pets waiting for homes.

events.title: Kids & Pets Education Day
events.description: A day dedicated to teaching kids about caring for animals through fun workshops, crafts, and meet-the-pet sessions.

events.title: Valentine’s Day Pet Matchmaking
events.description: Find love this Valentine’s Day with our special adoption matchmaking event. Singles and couples welcome!
